TEI.2.document_title: Henry Austin to Stephen F Austin, 11-28-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Henry Austin to Austin, November 28, 1831. Terán's visit beneficial. Austin worries too much about " babblers " of little influence; substantial men will take no step in public matters without his approval. Land troubles.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: J. Doane was captain of the schooner Spica. The trouble to which Austin refers is not clear. See Hall to Austin, July 26, 1831.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Henry Austin to Austin, November 28, 1831. Terán's visit beneficial. Austin worries too much about " babblers " of little influence; substantial men will take no step in public matters without his approval. Land troubles. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-28-1831">28 Novr. 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*My Dear Sir I have just recd yours pr*person_mentioned* D[r.] Archer*/person_mentioned* and am sorry to find the disappointment as to the Dearborn vexes you so much—as matters have turned out it was perhaps a fortunate circumstance the cold winter storm for a week past would have rendered the journey dangerous if not impracticable—*person_mentioned* She [Mrs. Holley]*/person_mentioned* recd your letter stating your intention to go to *location_mentioned*Anahuac */location_mentioned*and see her on your return, before I left She therefore determine [d] to remain at *location_mentioned*Bolivar */location_mentioned*until my return with my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*and then if you were at *location_mentioned*St Felipe*/location_mentioned* to go up with me on horse back if I could not get a carriage— I have now arranged for one here if wanted on my return*/p*
*p*I have been detained here*date_mentioned n="11-22-1831"> six days*/date_mentioned* by the storm, there is no chance of the Nelson getting in until it be over— we are now informed that *person_mentioned*Genl Teran*/person_mentioned* has returned to *location_mentioned*Matamoras*/location_mentioned*, and conclude you will not now leave *location_mentioned*St Felipe*/location_mentioned* until quite well. However severe your disappointment in not seeing *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*I think it is better than that you should have made the journey for travelling in this bad weather would in all probability have killed you— you have no doubt better information as to his departure than we have If it be true that he has removed the *person_mentioned*Garrison */person_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Galveston Island */location_mentioned*and Suspended the collection of duties till *date_mentioned n="04-xx-1832">April */date_mentioned*as report says I see no reason to regret his visit or sudden departure, it gives time to observe the moving of the waters I am told *location_mentioned*Jalisco */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*two other states */location_mentioned*have withdrawn from the *location_mentioned*union*/location_mentioned*, if so there may be a general break up next thaw and *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*will have enough to look after at home— I have seen your letter to *person_mentioned*John*/person_mentioned*—you ought not to permit these matters to worry you so much The *person_mentioned*bablers */person_mentioned*are mostly *person_mentioned*men of little influence*/person_mentioned* the substantial part of the *location_mentioned*community */location_mentioned*are not disposed to take any steps in public matters without your previous approbation—The *person_mentioned*talkers */person_mentioned*in the case of*person_mentioned* Capt Doon */person_mentioned*were mostly the *person_mentioned*shopkeepers*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*whisky drinkers*/person_mentioned*. I arrived here a few days after and defended the conduct of the *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned*who had done no more than his duty and had shown more lenity than would have been shown in such a ease in any other country*/p*
*p*When the case was fairly understood all the *person_mentioned*reasonable men*/person_mentioned* condemned *person_mentioned*Capt Doons*/person_mentioned* conduct—*/p*
*p*I wish much to have *person_mentioned*Mrs Holley */person_mentioned*see the *location_mentioned*upper country*/location_mentioned* as she is already preparing a work for publication on her return and I wish her to have a fair opportunity to describe the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and to see you long enoug[h] to get your ideas as to the representation best calculated to make such impression on the public mind as will suit your views of policy—*/p*
*p*The affair of *person_mentioned*Hall */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Phelps */person_mentioned*is like to do much mischief— which ever way it goes if *person_mentioned*Hall */person_mentioned*gets the *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*it establishes the principle that an individual may occupy the *location_mentioned*property */location_mentioned*of another without the warrant of any public authority or judicial act which might lead to much mischief and great disconfidence in titles generally- If *person_mentioned*Phelps */person_mentioned*has vitiated his title no act of *person_mentioned*Hall*/person_mentioned*s can make it good, but it strikes me as very dangerous to permit an individual to appropriate the labor of another to himself before any judicial act of forfeiture is had—if permitted on one pretense now it will soon be resorted to on another. I have already heard men speak of denouncing *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*on the ground of forfeiture for non settlement, having a *location_mentioned*league */location_mentioned*of the *person_mentioned*Hall family */person_mentioned*in view on which they say not a tree has been cut— who can foretell the effect of such proceedings upon the public mind here and in the *location_mentioned*US*/location_mentioned* where the Matter will not be understood and no doubt be much misrepresented— I am very anxious about my *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, the cold storm still continues. The moment I get them housed I shall come to *location_mentioned*St Felipe*/location_mentioned* and visit the *location_mentioned*upper country*/location_mentioned* if the weather will permit to look out a retreat for the summer I would not keep my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*at *location_mentioned*Bolivar */location_mentioned*through such a Season as the last for all *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*it would be a certain sacrifice of the lives of some of them-— I think somewhere near *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Cole*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* or *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Chrisman*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* will from all accounts be healthiest and safest there being a strong population there and in case I get the *person_mentioned*Swiss families */person_mentioned*I have sent for I will place one of them there to commence a *location_mentioned*vineyard*/location_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*J W[e]stall*/person_mentioned* has this moment come in with information that the Nelson is off the *location_mentioned*Bar */location_mentioned*and my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*on shore at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Captn Chas*/person_mentioned*es*/location_mentioned* all well— It rains hard but I start at once*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*My fingers and Ideas are froze up*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col S F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*St Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
